Introduction

Jihye was a South Korean singer under J-Star Entertainment and SW Entertainment. She was a member of the trot girl group Byulzzi and was a pre-debut member of the girl group 3piece (known as ONAIR pre-debut).

She was a trainee under SidusHQ from an unknown time up until sometime before 2020 when she joined THE NEW Entertainment as a member of Byulzzi.
